name: Support Vector Machine
description: Predicts classes of new data from old data by drawing a boundary between two classes whereas the margin around the bondary is made as large as possible to avoid touching the points.
introductoryText: Predicts classes of new data from old data by drawing a boundary between two classes whereas the margin around the boundary is made as large as possible to avoid touching the points

options.name: useAllNumericFields
options.title: Use all numeric fields
options.description: If set to true, "Fields to use" will be ignored and instead all numeric data fields used

options.name: fieldsToUse
options.title: Fields to use
options.description: Adjust to the fields you want to use in the prediction

options.name: fieldToPredict
options.title: Field to predict
options.description: Specify the field to predict on
